    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<FType> getDataTypesSorted(FModel idlModel)
      This will sort all the types in the model in the order they should appear in a C++ header without forward declarations, i.e. first the base types and then the derived ones.
      static java.lang.String relativeURIString(org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI from, org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI to)
      Computes the relative-URI from from to to.

    • Method Detail

      • getDataTypesSorted

        public static java.util.List<FType> getDataTypesSorted(FModel idlModel)
        This will sort all the types in the model in the order they should appear in a C++ header without forward declarations, i.e. first the base types and then the derived ones.
        Parameters:
        idlModel - the model delivering the types
        Returns:

      • relativeURIString

        public static java.lang.String relativeURIString(org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI from,
                                 org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI to)
        Computes the relative-URI from from to to. If the schemes or the first two segments (i.e. quasi-autority, e.g. the 'resource' of 'platform:/resource', and the project/plugin name) the aren't equal, this method returns to.toString().
